mutants.code:
def generate_gray_code(n: int) -> list[str]:
    gray_codes = []
    for i in range(1 << n):
        val = i | i >> 1
        s = bin(val)[2:].zfill(n)
        gray_codes.append(s)
    return gray_codes

    gray_codes = []
    for i in range(2 << n):

def generate_gray_code(n: int) -> list[str]:
    gray_codes = []
    for i in range(1 << n):
        val = i ^ i >> 1
        s = bin(val)[-2:].zfill(n)

    return gray_codes
